import React from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Card, Table, Badge } from 'react-bootstrap'; const SchoolTimings = () => { const dailySchedule = [ { time: "7:30 AM - 8:00 AM", activity: "Morning Assembly", description: "Prayer, National Anthem, Announcements" }, { time: "8:00 AM - 8:45 AM", activity: "1st Period", description: "Regular Classes" }, { time: "8:45 AM - 9:30 AM", activity: "2nd Period", description: "Regular Classes" }, { time: "9:30 AM - 9:45 AM", activity: "Break", description: "Short Break" }, { time: "9:45 AM - 10:30 AM", activity: "3rd Period", description: "Regular Classes" }, { time: "10:30 AM - 11:15 AM", activity: "4th Period", description: "Regular Classes" }, { time: "11:15 AM - 11:30 AM", activity: "Break", description: "Short Break" }, { time: "11:30 AM - 12:15 PM", activity: "5th Period", description: "Regular Classes" }, { time: "12:15 PM - 1:00 PM", activity: "6th Period", description: "Regular Classes" }, { time: "1:00 PM - 1:45 PM", activity: "Lunch Break", description: "Lunch and Recreation" }, { time: "1:45 PM - 2:30 PM", activity: "7th Period", description: "Regular Classes" }, { time: "2:30 PM - 3:15 PM", activity: "8th Period", description: "Regular Classes" }, { time: "3:15 PM - 3:30 PM", activity: "Dispersal", description: "School Dismissal" } ]; const classTimings = [ { class: "N/S, PKG & KG", summer: "7:30 AM - 11:30 AM", winter: "8:25 AM - 12:10 PM", days: "Monday - Friday" }, { class: "Class I to VIII", summer: "7:30 AM - 1:00 PM", winter: "8:25 AM - 1:50 PM", days: "Monday - Friday" } ]; const examinationSchedule = [ { period: "I U.T.", timing: "II week of May" }, { period: "Half yearly exam", timing: "III week of Sept." }, { period: "II U.T.", timing: "I week of Dec." }, { period: "Annual Exam", timing: "IV week of Feb." } ]; const ptmSchedule = [ { period: "I P.T.M.", timing: "II week of May" }, { period: "II P.T.M.", timing: "II week of July" }, { period: "III P.T.M.", timing: "II week of September" }, { period: "IV P.T.M. (Result declaration)", timing: "II week of October" }, { period: "V P.T.M.", timing: "II week of December" }, { period: "VI P.T.M.", timing: "II week of February" }, { period: "VII P.T.M. (Result declaration)", timing: "III week of March" } ]; const interactionTimings = [ { type: "Principal's Visiting Hours", timing: "Monday to Friday: 9:00 AM to 11:00 AM" }, { type: "Office Hours (Summer)", timing: "7:30 AM to 12:30 PM" }, { type: "Office Hours (Winter)", timing: "8:20 AM to 1:30 PM" }, { type: "Fee Timing (Summer)", timing: "7:30 AM to 12:30 PM" }, { type: "Fee Timing (Winter)", timing: "8:20 AM to 1:30 PM" }, { type: "P.T.M. Timing", timing: "8:30 AM to 11:00 AM" } ]; return (

School Timings

Daily schedule, class timings, and academic calendar information for Srijan School

{/* Class-wise Timings */}

 {classTimings.map((timing, index) => ( ))}
Class Timing Days
{timing.class} {timing.timing} {timing.days}
{/* Daily Schedule */}

Daily Schedule (Class I - XII)

 {dailySchedule.map((schedule, index) => ( ))}
Time Activity Description
{schedule.time} {schedule.activity} {schedule.description}
{/* Academic Calendar */}

Academic Calendar 2024-25

 {academicCalendar.map((month, index) => (
{month.month}

{month.events}

 ))} {/* Important Guidelines */}

Attendance Guidelines
  • Students must arrive 10 minutes before school starts
  • Late arrival requires permission from Principal
  • Minimum 75% attendance required for promotion
  • Medical leave requires doctor's certificate
  • Leave applications must be submitted in advance
  • Absence without prior notice is not acceptable

Holiday Guidelines
  • School follows CBSE holiday calendar
  • National and religious holidays are observed
  • Summer vacation: Mid-May to Mid-June
  • Winter vacation: Last week of December
  • Emergency holidays will be notified in advance
  • Make-up classes may be scheduled if needed
 {/* Emergency Procedures */}

Emergency Procedures

In case of emergency or unexpected school closure, parents will be notified through:

SMS

School Management System

Phone Call

Direct communication

Website

Official school website

Notice Board

School notice board

 ); }; export default SchoolTimings;
